price: 30. Dan orang yang beriman itu bekata, “Wahai kaumku! Sesungguhnya aku khawatir kamu akan ditimpa (bencana) seperti hari kehancuran golongan yang bersekutu,
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّثۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhī āmana yāqawmi innī akhāfu ʿalaykum mith'la yawmi al-aḥzābi
